messages.subject: Re: My Introduction!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Charlotte, Welcome to the list! I have an 11 year old boy also. What kinds of things is he doing for math? One thing my son has enjoyed is a math club which
messages.messageBody:
Hi Charlotte,

Welcome to the list! I have an 11 year old boy also. What kinds of things is
he doing for math? One thing my son has enjoyed is a math club which meets
once a month. Another homeschooling mom hosts the meeting at her home, and
about 10-15 children show up, ranging in age from about 7-13. They are doing
activities from the Reader's Digest book "How Math Works."

You might enjoy the Natural Math website for more ideas:
http://www.naturalmath.com/

Thea
metta@...

on 12/5/99 1:49 PM, CLegath@... at CLegath@... wrote:

> From: CLegath@...
>
> Hi, my name is Charlotte. I live in Livingston, LA. I have just recently
> started homeschooling my 11 year old son. I have been looking at different
> teaching styles and I really like the idea of unschooling.I also like
> Charlotte Mason's ideas too. The hardest thing for me so far is teaching
> Math. We are working slow in this area.
> Charlotte

messages.subject: My Introduction!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, my name is Charlotte. I live in Livingston, LA. I have just recently started homeschooling my 11 year old son. I have been looking at different teaching
messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Charlotte. I live in Livingston, LA. I have just recently
started homeschooling my 11 year old son. I have been looking at different
teaching styles and I really like the idea of unschooling.I also like
Charlotte Mason's ideas too. The hardest thing for me so far is teaching
Math. We are working slow in this area.
Charlotte
Evan 11
